definition: to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: You can count on being well-treated, as long as you behave yourself.
sentences.chinese: 只要你行为得当，保证就会得到善待。

sentences.english: You will have a productive day if you organize yourself well at work.
sentences.chinese: 如果工作安排得当，肯定能度过富有成效的一天。

sentences.english: It's a question of getting the right mix of policies to appeal to the electorate.
sentences.chinese: 问题是要有能投合选民心意的一整套相配得当的政策。

sentences.english: Floor are the proportion of properly, a deep eaves, cornices pick angle.
sentences.chinese: 楼身比例得当，出檐深邃，飞檐挑角。

sentences.english: If one handles small matters poorly, how can one handle large matters capably?
sentences.chinese: 如果连小事都无法管理得当，又哪有能力去处理大事？

sentences.english: First, ask yourself if you are acting honourably .
sentences.chinese: 首先，你应该问问你自己做得是否得当。

sentences.english: Nor is the charge of over-refinement altogether applicable to the Brahmins.
sentences.chinese: 指责绅士派文人过于文雅，也并非完全得当。

sentences.english: You have to be product manager, if not the actual coder and designer.
sentences.chinese: 就算不去搞编程设计，你也得当产品经理。

sentences.english: If venting is done carefully, there will be little leakage.
sentences.chinese: 如果释放压力得当的话，泄露将会非常少。

sentences.english: Appropriate educational methods, in the Student Union memories that last a lifetime impression.
sentences.chinese: 教育方法得当，中学生会留下终身难忘的印象。

sentences.english: If cared for properly, standard cells are very stable.
sentences.chinese: 如果处理得当，标准电池是非常稳定的。

sentences.english: When used appropriately, these medications can be very helpful and have few side effects.
sentences.chinese: 使用得当的话，这些药会很有效且几乎无副作用。

sentences.english: The effectiveness of your speech depends on your diction.
sentences.chinese: 你的演说效果在于你的用字是否得当。

sentences.english: If used properly, Weibo can also be effective in countering negative news.
sentences.chinese: 如果使用得当，微博还可以有效消除负面新闻。

sentences.english: The machine will go on working for years provided (that) it is looked after properly.
sentences.chinese: 这台机器如保养得当，就将继续工作很多年。

sentences.english: Be honest, use proper grammar and avoid slang and expletives.
sentences.chinese: 要坦诚，用语得当，并避免俚语和粗话。

definition: in addition/moreover/(used before a disyllabic verb to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
half the work, twice the effect (idiom); the right approach saves effort and leads to better results/a stitch in time saves nine
lit. what the heart wishes, the hand accomplishes (idiom) skilled at the job/entirely in one's element/going smoothly and easily
to get to the intended location/to be in place/to be in position/precise/well (done)
